name: Bracers of Archery, Lesser
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Bracers of Archery/Lesser

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, Craft Magic Arms and Armor, crafter must be proficient with a longbow or shortbow

sections.body: These wristbands function as greater bracers of archery, except that they grant a +1 competence bonus on attack rolls and no bonus on damage rolls.
sections.name: Description
